title: Website Development
description: Learn and practice the fundamental concepts and specific tools you can use to build basic websites. This track focuses only on the design and frontend (what your website visitor would see).

title: Web Application Development
description: Learn and practice the fundamental concepts and specific tools you can use to build high-quality websites and web applications. This cover everything from the design and frontend (what users would see and use) to the backend (where data of the users are managed).
goal: Master your strengths in problem-solving and build projects that could leverage you to land a decent job, get a freelance offer, or build your own software business.
